MMOServer.// ListenIP: Listening IP address for the MMO server, default is '*' which represents all IPv4 and IPv6 addresses
MMOServer.// Port: Listening port number for the MMO server
MMOServer.// EnableChat: When true, in-game chat will be enabled
MMOServer.// FirstEventTimer: time to start of first world event (battle ship event) after start MMO server
MMOServer.// EventTimer: time between start of world events (battle ship events), set both timer values (EventTimer and FirstEventTimer) to 0 to disable events
MMOServer.// RacingMaxPlayers: maximum players allowed in Thunder Run Racing (no more than 6)
MMOServer.// RacingMinPlayers: minimum players to start Thunder Run Racing
